text:
Hello!! :sos:
I'm getting one major problem on my blog dashboard again and again. The issue is like I have a blog listing template which includes on editable custom module. The fields of that module is showing up on the page of blog listing page editor. But when I tried to update the field value at blog listing page editor level it doesn't change anything. But when I tried to update the default value of the fields in the coded module it worked.

Here is the video explanation of our issue: <https://share.vidyard.com/watch/qnY2Efjry4Tot3qCNUJ88V>?

Anyone can help me with that please?
When you add custom svg icons to modules, could the meta.json have the svg code embedded instead of a link to a file? Just so everything is baked into the package?
Can you share the HTML youâ€™re using for that module here?
